title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 June 2009 - XWiki

kaaloo left at 12:35 ("Leaving.")  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:43): hai sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:44): Hi Chathurag  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:46): I dont have a access rights to add a StyleSheetExtention object to the demo  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:46): No, you should have the rights  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:46): What doesn't work?  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:47): last time marta add the javascriptextention object to the demo  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:48): I cant see those classes in the object editor   
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:48): They are in a panel on the right  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:49): ya but the list is missing those two classes  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:51): No, they are there  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:51): XWiki -> JavaScriptExtension  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:52): XWiki -> StyleSheetExtension  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:55): I cant see any classes under the Xwiki category. I think admin has to giv those rights.Thats why marta added the javascriptextention for me to work around  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:56): OK, I'll add it  
Chathurag - (13/06/2009 12:56): Ok thanks :)  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 12:56): Done  
vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 14:54  
trifon joined #xwiki at 15:45  
sdumitriu left at 15:45 ("Leaving.")  
anamarias left at 15:46 ()

anamarias joined #xwiki at 16:18  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 16:21  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 18:18  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:49): sdumitriu : HI  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 18:49): Hi  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:50): Some error with my component .. it says Failed to dynamically load components with annotations  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:50): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d64077208  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:51): I have removed all the annotations.  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:51): still the same issue  
trifon left at 18:52 ("ChatZilla 0.9.84 [Firefox 3.0.11/2009060215]")  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 18:59): sdumitriu: Ping.. Am i Understandable.?  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 18:59): Yes, I was away for a minute  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:00): Its nice to see open solaris moving to XWiki.   
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:01): Yes  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:01): I have got a mail from opensolaris team .  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:01): You?  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:01): About what?  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:01): Are you registered on their site?  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:02): Yes  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:02): asking to re register. because they are coming up with new auth system.  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:03): Email : http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d31b72b3c  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:04): OK, about the error  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:04): Where do you get this?  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:05): in the XE console  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:06): Might be something temporary  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:07): Try downloading a fress XE from here: http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/com/xpn/xwiki/products/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/2.0-SNAPSHOT/  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:07): And when i try to use it . Its not working  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:08): the xe am using is build in the morning.  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:08): Yes, but Vincent has been playing with the component manager today  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:08): k  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:08): :)  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:08): one more.  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:08): the macro archetype.  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:09): module on jira.. when build fails due to codestyle errors  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:11): Yes?  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:11): I mean to say the maven project with macro archetype module fails due to codestyle erros.  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:13): Oh  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:13): Ask Vincent, that's his code  
sdumitriu - (13/06/2009 19:13): You can disable checkstyle in the meantime  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:15): Ok.  
arunreddy - (13/06/2009 19:15): :)  
lucaa left at 19:16 ("Leaving.")
